question: L&T MBDA Missile Systems (LTMMSL) has recently set up a missile integration facility at which state?
explanation:
L&T MBDA Missile Systems (LTMMSL) has recently set up a missile integration facility at Coimbatore city in the state of Tamil Nadu. LTMMSL is a joint venture between the engineering and construction firm Larsen &Toubro and the European defence company MBDA. 
The 16,000 sq.m-inert integration facility is set up in a Special Economic Zone and will manufacture weapon systems to domestic and global markets. It also has finer equipment for testing the Missile Subsystems and weapon launch systems. This project is a part of the Tamil Nadu Defence Industrial Corridor.
